title: South Facing 1x1 with Balcony Awaits you Calling it Home!
posting_body: ["One look and you'll know why The Joe is special.", 'Steel beams frame walls of glass – allowing Mother Nature to rotate spectacular murals of snowcapped peaks and dramatic sunsets over Puget Sound.', "One look and you'll know why The Joe is special.", 'Steel beams frame walls of glass – allowing Mother Nature to rotate spectacular murals of snowcapped peaks and dramatic sunsets over Puget Sound.', 'Natural materials nod to the Northwest while refined finishes combine to create contemporary loft homes like no other.', "It's sophisticated, practical, refined urban living - as only Joe would have it.", 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'x 53', 'Visit This Website to See More:', '<URL>', 'This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 710 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Features', '- New/Renovated Interior', '- Energy-efficient fixtures', '- Green (nauf) cabinetry', '- Cable Ready & Free Wi-Fi', '- Bamboo flooring', '- Efficient hot water equipment', '- Maximized natural & hybrid ventilation', '- Walk or bike to work, waterfront, downtown', '- Large windows maximize daylight', '- Electric sub-metering', '- Energy-efficient heating & cooling', '- Ozone-friendly refrigeration systems', '- Low-voc paint and carpet', '- Water sub', '-metering', '- Loft Style', '- Water-conserving fixtures', '- Hardwood Flooring', 'Community Amenities', '- Business center', '- Rooftop deck with breathtaking views', '- Vegetated green roof reduces water run-off', '- Rooftop pet lounge', '- Non-smoking building', '- Grand lounge', '- Electric vehicle charging stations', '- Nearby zipcar and public transportation', '- Attached garage parking', '- Water-conserving irrigation systems', '- Street-access bike storage and workbench', '- 24-hour fitness center', '- Landscaping features hardy, native vegetation', 'Pet Policy', 'Pet Friendly', 'Joseph Arnold Lofts', '62 Cedar St, Seattle, WA, 98121', 'Photos and/or floor plans shown are representational and may not depict the exact layout or features of the available unit.', "If currently occupied, the individual unit you've selected may not be available to tour.", 'Please contact our leasing team with any questions.', 'L8i2lTGrGmS']
